dt: {bc}the quality or state of being accurate (as in alignment or adjustment)
used in the phrases {it}in true{/it} and {it}out of true{/it}

shortdef: the quality or state of being accurate (as in alignment or adjustment) —used in the phrases in true and out of true

dt: {bc}to make level, square, balanced, or concentric {bc}bring or restore to a desired mechanical accuracy or form
